result.heading: NANCE, AS HE GETS OUT OF PISCANO'S CAR INT
SAN MARINO ITALIAN GROCERY, KANSAS CITY

direction.raw_text: : NANCE, AS HE GETS OUT OF PISCANO'S CAR INT. SAN MARINO ITALIAN GROCERY, KANSAS CITY - DAY NANCE and PISCANO walk through the grocery store, through the warehouse, past various employees to a doorway leading into the back room, where they are greeted by five older men around a large wooden table with bowls of macaroni and old jelly glasses filled with red wine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...he had to fly in with suitcases once a month, nice and easy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somethin' smells good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, they made us somethin' to eat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The bosses would come from all over the place: Detroit, Cleveland, Milwaukee. All over the Midwest. And they would meet in the back of this produce market in Kansas City. I mean, nobody even knew. NANCE shakes hands with AMERICO CAPELLI, sixty-eight, a bald, affable Milwaukee entrepreneur and ARTHUR CAPP, his thirty- year-old yuppie lawyer son. Camera continues to pan around the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One of the guys made his mother do all the cooking. On VINCENT BORELLI, seventy-year-old Kansas City boss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you ever see that guy Jerry Steriano? On VINNIE FORLANO, mid-seventies, an old-timer who once drove for Capone and is now Remo Gaggi's right-hand man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jerry Steriano?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, these old greaseballs might not look it, but believe me, these are the guys who secretly controlled Las Vegas. PISCANO joins his MOTHER and DAUGHTER by a stove.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That man's here again. Piscano dips a piece of bread into a pot of tomato sauce.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because they controlled the Teamsters' Union, and that's where you had to go if you wanted to borrow money to buy a casino.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you've finished with him, I want him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Carrying a plate of food to the table where BORELLI and FORLANO are seated.) Here you are, gentlemen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And nobody got a Teamsters' loan, unless the guys in this room knew they were gonna get their little suitcases. FORLANO gets up from the table and walks toward NANCE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guys like this antique here [FORLANO], out of Detroit. Or especially guys like Remo Gaggi, the outfit's top boss. NANCE embraces REMO GAGGI who's seated on a couch, and sits across from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got a round figure on it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Definitely the most important guy in this room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Picking up the suitcase) About twenty pounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's around seven hundred thousand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-huh, good. NANCE opens the case to reveal the money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Off-screen, from following scene) I know it's a little early for Las Vegas... INT. TANGIERS EXECUTIVE OFFICE PRESS CONFERENCE/BANQUET ROOM - DAY Camera tilts down a model of the Tangiers Hotel and Casino, then reveals the cover of Business Week magazine with a drawing of PHILIP GREEN, a young corporate type, smiling out under the headline: 'Philip Green, Vegas Wunderkind'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...but I do want to welcome the ladies and gentlemen of the gaming industry. On ANDY STONE, a middle-aged man at a podium giving a speech while GREEN, seated at a table, looks on. PHOTOGRAPHERS flash their cameras. ACE and SHERBERT, sitting next to GREEN, also watch the photo op ceremony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As far as the world was concerned Andy Stone, the head of the Teamsters' Pension Fund, was a legitimate guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a very auspicious occasion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A powerful man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Philip, if you would rise. Green stands up. ACE (V.O.) He even played golf with the President.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On behalf of the Teamsters' Pension Fund, it is my pleasure to present to you . . .
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But Andy also took orders. And when he was told to give a pension fund loan to Philip Green...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Handing GREEN a large cardboard facsimile 'check') ...this check for $62,700,000 for the new Tangiers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...he did what he was told. PHILIP GREEN, who is now the head of the Tangiers Hotel and Casino Corporation, is standing at the podium giving a speech.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now here was the perfect front man. I mean, what the fuck else could he be?  He didn't know too much. He didn't want to know too much, especially that the bosses made the Teamsters lend him the money. He wanted to believe the Teamsters gave him all that fuckin' money 'cause he was smart. An exploding flash bulb fills the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I say that, knowing full well just how much competition we have in this great city. EXT. CHEAP MOTEL OFF HIGHWAY - DAY We see a MAN and a WOMAN swimming underwater. Camera reveals that they are in a motel swimming pool with glass portholes. Expensive cars are parked outside one of the rooms. Hoods stand around outside the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And where they got Green from - who the fuck knows?  All I know is that Green was an Arizona real estate hustler, who barely had enough gas money to come and pick up his own fuckin' check... INT. TANGIERS EXECUTIVE OFFICE PRESS CONFERENCE/BANQUET ROOM - DAY We return to the press conference. Photographers snap away. In the background are six-foot blow-ups of the Business Week cover. The camera moves past GREEN, CAPP and several other men, past SHERBERT, to ACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, all they needed was somebody they could trust to run the casino. And who better than Ace?  I mean, he was already in Vegas a couple of years and he had the fuckin' place clocked. FREEZE FRAME ON ACE. INT. TANGIERS SWIMMING POOL - DAY Camera looks straight down from the top of a hotel to a large pool area.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But typical Ace... INT. TANGIERS SWIMMING POOL/POOLSIDE - DAY STONE, in a bathing suit and robe, sits on a lounge chair with a telephone. ACE, in sports clothes, sits on another chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...give him a shot at runnin' a casino and he tries to talk you out of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, I don't know if I could do this even if I wanted to. The Gaming Commission would never give me a license. I have at least two dozen gambling and bookmaking pinches on me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have to have a license to work in a casino. All you gotta do is apply for one. The state law says you can work in a casino while they're processing your application. They got a ten-year backlog.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But what happens when they do find out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would they want to find out? We're puttin' a hundred million into this desert here. Why would they want to lock us out?  And besides, they'll never find out. All you gotta do is keep changing your job title. Like, uh, from Casino Executive to Food and Beverage Chairman. And what happens it, they take your application, they put it at the bottom of the pile. I know guys workin' there for thirty years, don't have a license.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Exhales) It's a tough proposition, Andy. You, you know, if I did it, I'd have to run it my way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm serious. No interference.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nobody's gonna interfere with your running the casino. I guarantee it. Stone lights a cigarette. INT. TANGIERS CRAPS PIT - NIGHT ACE blows on a die.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that's how that got Ace to take over. ACES's hands place the die into a micrometer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They wanted him because Ace ate, slept and breathed gambling. Camera swish tilts up to ACE, then swish pans to boxman, dealers and players watching him, trying to act calm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They worked out a real cute job title too. We see the die in the micrometer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tangiers Public Relations Director. Satisfied the die is not loaded ACE sets it on the craps table, the camera cranes up to reveal the Tangiers Casino floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But the only thing he ever directed was the casino. He made his first bet when he was fifteen years old, and he always made money. But he didn't bet like you or me. A DEALER is sliding chips, tossing them on to a craps table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, havin' some fun with it, shit like that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Approaching the DEALER) Where the hell did you learn how to deal? (He reaches down, stacking and arranging the chips.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He bet like a fuckin' brain surgeon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To the chastised DEALER) Place the checks properly. That's the way you do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He had to know everything, this guy. Direct overhead tracking shot as ACE walks between two rows of gaming tables.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'd find out the kind of inside stuff nobody else knew, and that's what he'd put his money on. INT. GYM/BOOKIE JOINT, BACK HOME, PRE-SEVENTIES - DAY ACE walks past two boxers sparring in a ring, through a doorway into a room where several gamblers are seated around a table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even back home, years ago, when we were first hangin' out together... TITLE IN: 'BACK HOME, YEARS AGO' NICKY (V.O.) ...he'd know if the quarterback was on coke. ACE is looking at the odds board for college football games. The bookie, LUCKY LARRY, is waiting for ACE to hand in his picks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll take Columbia for twenty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If his girlfriend was knocked up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Twenty dimes on Columbia . . . As soon as ACE bets, a man erases a number from the chalkboard and replaces it was a '6', changing the odds. Two GAMBLERS saunter from the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'd get the wind velocity so he could judge the field goals. He even figured out the different bounce you got off the different kinds of wood they used on college basketball courts, you know? EXT. GYM/BOOKIE JOINT PUBLIC PHONES - DAY The two GAMBLERS we saw sauntering out of the bookie joint are racing to the nearest public phones. Another GAMBLER has already beaten them to it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'd be workin' on this shit day and night. There was nothin' about a game he was gonna bet that he didn't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into phone) Ace got down at six.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into phone) Charlie, hey. Rothstein got six. INT. GYM/BOOKIE JOINT, SEVERAL DAYS LATER - DAY A bookie hands a stack of money to another bookie, who hands the money to ACE. ACE removes several bills from the top of the stack of winnings and holds them out to the BOOKIES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Season after season, the prick was the only guaranteed winner I ever knew. But he was so serious about it all that I don't think he ever enjoyed himself.  But... ACE exits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...that's just the way he was. INT. MOB SOCIAL CLUB BACK ROOM - NIGHT The room has an espresso machine and a saint's day calendar. Assorted hoods are listening to NICKY at the bar. Camera dollies to REMO GAGGI, at the rear table playing gin rummy with OLD MAN CAPO and losing. Every time the CAPO picks up a card, he's able to knock or get gin, sending GAGGI into a fit bemoaning his bad luck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But back then the bosses didn't give a fuck about whether he enjoyed himself of not. To them, he was a cash register. All they had to do was ring the bell and take the money. Especially Remo, who was a fuckin' degenerate gambler who always lost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Slams down his cards and curses at his losing hands) Ma che cazzo! [Italian-American slang for 'What a prick.'] All those fuckin' sweeps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, unless Ace made his bet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's enough now!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't contest the cards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Va fa 'n culo! [Italian-American slang for 'Fuck off'] (Summoning a young man.) Johnny!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ace made more money for them on a weekend than I could do heisting joints for a month. ACE enters and walks to GAGGI's table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever Ace picked up on the street he told Remo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Walks over to ACE and whispers) Hey, did you bring that thing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, I mean fixed fights, doped horses, crooked fuckin' zebras... locked-in point spreads. He told fuckin' Remo everything. And to tell you the truth. I don't blame him. GAGGI stands up and shakes ACE's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keepin' Remo happy with money was the greatest insurance policy in the world. GAGGI beams as ACE takes out an envelope filled with cash and hands it over to him. GAGGI sits back down and ACE, knowing his place, smiles and is about to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Son-of-a-bitch. How the hell did you get Oklahoma-Michigan?  Nobody ever had Oklahoma-Mi... How the hell'd you do it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, that's why they paid so well.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You see? (Chuckles.) Never tells me nothin'. Ace, what do we got on for next week?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it's a little too early. I'd say Thursday would be good. I'll know by then. Is that all right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. You come by the house?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll come by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seven o'clock?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seven o'clock. GAGGI gets up and kisses ACE as NICKY and OLD MAN CAPO look on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good job, my boy. Keep it up. Okay, Ace? ACE nods in agreement and leaves the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To NICKY) Hey, Nick. Vien acca. [Italian- American slang for 'Come here']
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To ACE) I'll be right out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: T'aggia parla. [Italian-American slang for 'I've got to talk to you'] Nicky... See that guy? (pointing to the off- screen ACE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep a good eye on him. He's makin' a lot of money for us. And he's gonna continue makin' a lot of money for us, so keep a good eye on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not like your fuckin' friends out there, that... without brains.  Okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-huh. Mi raccomando. [Italian- American slang for 'I'm counting on you']
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Reaching down to touch GAGGI's money, joking with him.) Want me to take this for you? (He walks out.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, now, on top of everything else, I gotta make sure that nobody fucks around with the Golden Jew. INT. BACK HOME BAR - NIGHT We move past JOE, a guy at the bar entertaining a BRUNETTE and a BLONDE, to NICKY and FRANK MARINO at the other end. There are other bar patrons in the background.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To the BARTENDER) Chase, couple of shooters for the ladies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, we made a great pair. I made book and Nicky made sure we always collected. The old men loved us. And why not? They all made money with us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To MARINO) They payin'?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did Nicky collect?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They pay every week, like they're supposed to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't ask. NICKY Then where the fuck is the money? I don't see the money. ACE enters, and greets the two girls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Melissa. Heidi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Sam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To the GIRLS) Who's this guy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To NICKY) Get the fuck out of here. It was nine. I laid nine. ACE approaches NICKY and MARINO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was eight.  Ace... tell him the line on the Bear's game.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If he don't know, nobody knows. Told you it was eight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, how come I laid nine?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Cause you're a jag-off. I would have fuckin' made you lay ten... ACE notices a pen lying on the bar. He taps JOE on the shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To JOE) Excuse me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (He holds up the pen) Is this yours? Your pen?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, that's my pen. Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I ju- Well, it's a nice pen. I just didn't know whose it was. I thought it was yours. I didn't want it to get lost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, thank you. Why don't you take that fuckin' pen and shove it up you ass, you fuckin' jag-off? NICKY looks over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I was just offering you the- NICKY moves towards JOE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Turning his back to talk to the girls, referring to ACE) This fuckin' asshole. NICKY grabs the pen out of ACE's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To JOE) Look out! Before ACE can react, NICKY grabs JOE and starts stabbing him in the neck with the pen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Joe! Look out, Joe! Look out! NICKY grunts while JOE gasps and groans. The BLONDE screams while NICKY's hand continues to plunge the pen into JOE's throat. JOE tumbles to the floor. NICKY pounces on him, still stabbing and now kicking. JOE whimpers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that? You hear? You hear a little girl, Frankie? You hear a little girl, Ace? Is that a little fuckin' girl?!  What happened to the fuckin' tough guy?  Told my friend stick it up his fuckin' ass?! Huh?! Huh?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over whimpers and pants) Wait a sec, Nicky, Nicky, Nicky. Ta- take it easy. ACE looks stunned. NICKY's still holding the bloody pen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: While I was tryin' to figure out why the guy was sayin' what he was sayin', Nicky just hit him. No matter how big a guy might be, Nicky would take him on. You beat Nicky with fists, he comes back with a bat. You beat him with a knife, he comes back with a gun. And you beat him with a gun, you better kill him, because he'll keep comin' back and back until one of you is dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen... INT. TANGIERS CASINO FLOOR, 1972 - NIGHT Camera swoops from a woman cheering as she wins at a slot- machine to a blackjack table, then to a roulette table and over to a craps table. Montage of very short cuts of chips being picked up, dice thrown, money being poured from a bucket, stacks of money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...with me protecting Ace, he made a fortune for the bosses. I mean that's what got him to Vegas. He was a money machine. A tremendous earner for these guys.  As soon as he took over, he doubled the fuckin' drop. With Ace the casino never saw so much money. And the bosses, they couldn't be happier. INT. TANGIERS CASINO FLOOR - NIGHT Camera moves in on ACE as he looks out over the casino. Dealers deftly stack chips, scoop up losses and pay off winners. Chips and money are everywhere. In extreme close-up slow motion a die falls on to a table. INT. TANGIERS CASINO SLOT-MACHINE AREA - NIGHT ACE and SHERBERT are walking down a casino aisle by the slot- machines. Dealers immediately snap to attention at their approach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In Vegas, I had to keep a few juiced- in local cowboys working. They were close to the, you know, good old boys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To SHERBERT) Pay him six hundred a week, tell him to walk around and look smart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, without us, these guys, they'd still be shovellin' mule shit. ACE points at paper cups, empty glasses and the debris of silver dollar wrappings on the floor. DON WARD, the Slots Manager in Western garb, immediately starts picking up the debris. ACE looks at WARD sternly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ward, you gotta keep a cleaner station. If you need 'Mr Clean', page him, all right? WARD bends down and picks up some trash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It won't happen again, Sam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr Rothstein.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To SHERBERT) Is this guy just another dumb fuckin' white man, or what? What's his story?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We need this guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can't get rid of him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's juiced in. He's the County Commissioner's cousin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't give the bum a mop job. They exit. INT. TANGIERS BACCARAT TABLES - NIGHT A card shoe slides across the baccarat table. A state SENATOR, a little drunk, tips the dealer, kisses the blonder HOOKER with him, fills his pockets with his winnings and walks over to see ACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These yokels ran the state.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you very much, Senator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They passed the laws, they owned the courts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Ace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Senator. They shake hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To ACE) Hey, I need a room. Need a room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good to see ya. (To SHERBERT) William would you... The SENATOR shakes hands with SHERBERT as the HOOKER joins them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had dozens of politicians and state officials comin' through that place every week.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice to see you, Senator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To SHERBERT) Help the Senator, give him whatever he wants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Certainly. (Leads the way.) Senator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not make them happy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have some nice penthouses you'll enjoy. Maybe the Presidential Suite. INT. TANGIERS PRESIDENTIAL SUITE - DAY The SENATOR unzips the HOOKER's dress, kisses her and walks through the bedroom doorway, looking over his shoulder to her as she takes off her dress and walks out of his sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For politicians... INT. TANGIERS BACCARAT TABLES - DAY ACE smoking a cigarette by the baccarat tables.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...like our state senator up there, everything was on the house. INT. TANGIERS PRESIDENTIAL SUITE - DAY The SENATOR opens a bureau drawer and takes out a small velvet pouch and pours black $100 into his palm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These guys won their comped life when they got elected. So, hey, why not take advantage of it? Still, the politicians come cheap. We could handle them. INT. TANGIERS, ICHIKAWA LUXURY SUITE - DAY K. K. ICHIKAWA a Japanese businessman, and a male associate pick up towels and soap from about the bedroom of their suite. A blonde woman checks herself in the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a whale like K. K. Ichikawa, who plays thirty thousand dollars a hand in baccarat. That's the one you really gotta watch. ICHIKAWA and his associate walk into the the suite's living- room and join a Japanese woman seated on a couch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He plays fast and big and he has the cash and the credit to turn out your lights. About a year ago, he cleaned out a couple of casinos in the Cayman Islands. They begin to stuff Tangiers soap and towels into their luggage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Downstairs, he takes us for two million... and upstairs he takes free soap, shampoo and towels. Another billionaire cheapskate who loves his free rooms... EXT. TANGIERS JET, LAS VEGAS AIRPORT - DAY The Tangiers jet with the Tangiers logo on its side as ICHIKAWA shakes ACE's hands before boarding. SHERBERT follows him and his associates aboard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...free private jets, and two million of our money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice to see you again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But we got him back. I had our pilot tell him the plane was on the fritz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ken, I don't know what the hell went wrong. I'm awfully sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a big problem. Big problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't understand it. These mechanical things, you know, they happen. Hey, be-better here than (gesturing to the sky) up there, you know what I mean? INT. LAS VEGAS AIRPORT RESERVATION DESK - NIGHT SHERBERT arguing with TICKET AGENT as ICHIKAWA and entourage look glum.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then he missed the commercial flights connecting with Japan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so sorry. There's a convention in town, and all flights are booked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A convention? (Turning to ICHIKAWA) I can't believe that there's a convention. It's never... ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What can I do? EXT. TANGIERS CASINO - NIGHT A smiling ACE greets ICHIKAWA and his entourage as they drive up and get out of Tangiers limos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We got him back ...with a whole floor of rooms for himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry you missed the plane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to get my money back, right? (Chuckles)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, no. No gambling. No. INT. TANGIERS BACCARAT TABLES - NIGHT ICHIKAWA, with the Japanese woman, picks up some chips and places them on the table. ACE and SHERBERT watch from behind a barrier.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He bet one thousand a hand instead of his usual thirty thousand a hand. A dealer's hands slide two cards on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The bank wins a natural eight over a five. Another dealer's hands place two chips on a table. ICHIKAWA looks on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I knew, the trick with whales like Ichikawa was that they can't bet small for long. He didn't think of it as winning ten thousand, he thought of it as losing ninety thousand. ICHIKAWA places a larger bet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, he upped his bets... A dealer picks up some chips from a rack and places them on the table. ICHIKAWA is now seated with stacks of chips in front of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...until he dropped his winnings back and gave up a million of his own cash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the casino, the cardinal rule is to keep them playing... Move in on ACE as he smokes a cigarette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and keep them coming back. The longer they play, the more they lose. In the end, we get it all. INT. TANGIERS CASINO - NIGHT ACE, with pit bosses next to him, looks out over the huge casino where hundreds of thousands of dollars are being poured into machines.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In Vegas, everybody's gotta watch everybody else. Camera reveals the DEALER at a craps table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Six, an easy way. Six! All right, who's gonna give me... The DEALER places some chips on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Since the players are looking to beat the casino... THE CAMERA IS ON THE DEALER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...both dice must hit that back wall each and every roll. All right, make a six! CAMERA PANS TO A WOMAN AND A MAN AT THE TABLE. THE WOMAN TOSSES SOME DICE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...the dealers are watching the players.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gimme a six!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, baby, make a six! A BOX MAN, seated mid-table is watching the DEALER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The box men are watching the dealers. CAMERA PANS TO THE DEALER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Humming, fielding, every roll.) CAMERA PANS TO A FLOOR MAN, STANDING DIRECTLY BEHIND THE BOX MAN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The floor men are watching the box men. CAMERA SWISH PANS TO REVEAL A PIT BOSS STEPPING IN, SCANNING THE FLOOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The pit bosses are watching the floor men. SWISH PAN TO A SHIFT BOSS SURVEYING THE CASINO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The shift bosses are watching the pit bosses. SWISH PAN TO SHERBERT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The casino manager is watching the shift bosses. SWISH PAN TO ACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm watching the casino manager. CAMERA SWISH PANS AND TILTS UP TO A VIDEO CAMERA MOUNTED INSIDE A GLASS DOME HANGING FROM THE CEILING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the eye-in-the-sky is watching us all. SWISH PAN TO: INT. TANGIERS-EYE-IN-THE SKY MONITOR ROOM - NIGHT Video monitors show a dealer fanning a row of bills. Swish pan to ACE and SHERBERT watching the monitor. ACE lights a cigarette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plus... SWISH PAN TO SURVEILLANCE CATWALKERS ADJUSTING CAMERAS AND SPYING ON PLAYERS BELOW WITH BINOCULARS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...we had a dozen guys up there, most of them ex-cheats, who knew every trick in the house. INT. TANGIERS CRAPS TABLE - NIGHT Ginger squeals as she throws the dice across the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, come on. She rolls a winner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. Very nice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Chuckles) I told you I was hot tonight. INT. TANGIERS EYE-IN-THE-SKY MONITOR ROOM - NIGHT Sound out: The monitor shows GINGER and the HIGH ROLLER cheering, she throws her arms around him. The crowd goes crazy. SWISH PAN TO ACE LOOKING ON INTENTLY. On screen, GINGER's hand sneaks a chip from the rack and subtly moves it towards her purse. INT. TANGIERS CRAPS TABLE - NIGHT Sound in: GINGER slips the chip quietly into her bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Off-screen) Let's go. This is for Ginger. Come on. This is for Ginger. The HIGH ROLLER notices GINGER's hand on her purse. She pretends to have taken out her lipstick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me have a hundred on the hard ten. Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hard ten. One hundred. INT. TANGIERS EYE-IN-THE-SKY MONITOR ROOM - NIGHT ACE continues to look at the monitor. SHERBERT and a security man seated at a video console also look on. INT. TANGIERS CRAPS TABLE - NIGHT A craps stick pushes some dice towards GINGER. She rolls again, only this time she craps out. Gamblers groan, then applaud her. She's made so much money for the table that the winners toss chips in her direction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry. (To the table) Thank you very much. Thank you very much. ACE and two casino execs are now on the floor watching her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, sir, I appreciate that. Everybody, thanks. Gives some chips as tips to the dealer and box man. Thanks. Take care, Steve. Take chances and drive fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ginger, honey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you very much, now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ginger, honey, this is for you love. Thanks for your time. She turns to the HIGH ROLLER, who is handing her a thin stack of chips worth about $2,000.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Chuckles) Come on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the matter?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean, 'What's the matter?' I made a lot of money for you. I want my cut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What money? I've seen you stealing from me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What money?  Look at this stack of chips. Don't give me that shit. I want my end.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ginger, I've been watching you all night. You've been stealing from me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't give me that shit. I want my money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That bag's full of fuckin' chips you
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Interrupts) What do you mean 'stole'? I didn't steal anything from you. ACE watches the argument heat up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get lost, Ginger! Get lost!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get lost?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get lost?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. GINGER knocks the chip rack out of his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, how 'bout that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! (He bends down to pick them up.) Gamblers and dealers shout and yell. She picks up another rack of chips and tosses them into the air, then another, and another. Chips fly all over the casino. Everyone starts diving for chips. Dealers. Players. Security guards. Waitresses. Pit bosses. Bedlam. ACE and the two execs with him are the only ones not diving for chips. He looks at GINGER. She looks at him. FREEZE FRAME ON GINGER. Slow motion: GINGER smiles at ACE and walks off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What a move. I fell in love right there. INT. COCKTAIL LOUNGE - NIGHT GINGER and ACE are seated on a banquette. Close up of his hand attaching a diamond and ruby pin to her dress. Tilt up to GINGER's smiling face beaming at ACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But in Vegas, for a girl like Ginger, love costs money. They kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to go powder my nose. (ACE hands GINGER a single $50 bill. She smiles coyly. He hands her another fifty.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ginger's mission in life was money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be right back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (from following scene) See you, Ginger. FLASHBACK - EXT. CASINO ENTRANCE - NIGHT GINGER waves goodbye to the DOORMAN and walks towards two VALET PARKERS who greet her warmly. She gets a bottle of pills from one of them and slips some cash into his hand in return.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, thank you for asking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She was a queen around the casino. She brought in high rollers and helped them spread around a lot of money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To VALET PARKERS) Hello.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Ginger, how you doin'?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great. (Handing the VALET some money.) And I have something for you. You got me covered? The VALET PARKER places a vial of pills in her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Something for you, there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you do. Thank you very much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take care of yourself. FLASHBACK - INT. HOTEL SUITE BATHROOM - NIGHT GINGER hands the pills to HIGH ROLLER #2 in his hotel bathroom, where he is washing his face and trying to energize himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got some lucky pills for you, honey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who didn't want Ginger? She was one of the best-known, best-liked and most respected hustlers in town. Smart hustlers like her could keep a guy awake for two or three days before sending him home broke to the little woman and his bank examiners. INT. COCKTAIL LOUNGE - NIGHT GINGER comes back from the ladies room. She kisses ACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any change?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Chuckles) I hit a few... uh, games on the way back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was all bullshit. She just pocketed the cash. FLASHBACK - INT. TANGIERS CASHIER'S CAGE - NIGHT GINGER converts her chips into a pile of $100 bills.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To CASHIER) How you doin' tonight?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. How are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Sighing) Oh, beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ginger had the hustler's code.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take one for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (While she counts out the cash) Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She knew how to take care of people. And that's what Vegas was all about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (As she pushes a stack of $100 bills across the counter) Sixty-eight hundred.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks She picks up the cash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Kickback City.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have a good night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. You too. Close-up of GINGER folding a $100 bill and placing it in her palm. She slips the folded bill deftly into the palm of a floor manager.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She took care of the dealers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Mitch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...pit bosses, floor managers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But mostly... EXT. TANGIERS ENTRANCE - NIGHT GINGER, on her way out of the casino, passes a folded $100 bill to a smiling older SHIFT BOSS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...she took care of the valet parkers, the guys who could get you anything and take care of anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks a lot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Ginger. EXT. TANGIERS ENTRANCE - NIGHT GINGER exits and gets into her car, slipping a VALET PARKER a $100 bill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ginger took care of the parkers because they took care of the security guards, who took care of the metro cops, who let her operate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Ginger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Getting into her car) I need that stuff tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a doll.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The valet parking job was such a money-maker that they had to pay off the hotel manager just to get the concession. INT. GINGER'S APARTMENT - DAY GINGER enters the room with $25,000 in her hands. She taps LESTER DIAMOND's leg with it and he turns to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But one thing I could never understand, was that she could have everything under control, except for her old pimp boyfriend, Lester Diamond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, Gin, you know I got other people in this. I got partners. But I want you to understand that I am lookin' out for you in this thing.  Okay? You're going to get yours back... and you're gonna get it back first. Okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you goin'? Where are you? You're in that place. Where are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you're not. Where are you? Where are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm always here for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am. He hastily kisses GINGER and slips out the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Ginger I knew wouldn't even look at this creep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good luck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was a moocher, a card cheat, a country-club golf hustler. A scumbag... chasing dentists for a few bucks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Careful. GINGER looks out of the window and sees LESTER get into a convertible and drive off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, the guy was always broke, he always had a story. And somehow, she could never turn him down. The way Ginger saw it, I guess, was that Lester was just an unlucky guy. Somebody had to take care of him. INT. BACK HOME AIRPORT/CUSTOMS - DAY NICKY, his wife JENNIFER, with a beehive hairdo, and their eight-year-old son LITTLE NICKY, are detained while their luggage is searched by a customs agent. TITLE IN: 'BACK HOME' ACE (V.O.) But nobody had to take care of Nicky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To customs agent) You find any cash in there, we'll whack it up with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, he took care of himself only too well. And that's why every badge back home wanted to nail him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To customs agent) Excuse me, but I folded these things beautifully and I would appreciate a little respect. Jesus Christ!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't look at me, pal. I gotta live with her. We see MARINO waiting for NICKY outside the customs area. Two COPS push past him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even after a little vacation, they hassled him at the airport.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To MARINO) Excuse me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, Frank Marino was there to meet him, but so were the cops. This time they wanted to pinch him for some diamond burglary in Antwerp. CAMERA DOLLIES IN ON JENNIFER'S BEEHIVE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes. Will you help me fold these, please?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They were ready to blame him for anything, no matter where it happened. FLASH FORWARD - INT. NICKY'S HOUSE/BACK HOME - DAY NICKY, JENNIFER, LITTLE NICKY and MARINO walk in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To LITTLE NICKY) You go and put your things away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And they were usually right. NICKY, JENNIFER and MARINO are gathered around the kitchen table. JENNIFER leans over and starts to shake her hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa, whoa, whoa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold it, hold it. Here. NICKY places a red towel down on the table. JENNIFER leans over again, tugs and shakes her hair until diamonds begin to fall out of her beehive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because Nicky enjoyed being a gangster, and he didn't give a damn who knew it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. There we go. Look at that. Beautiful. Diamonds fall on the red towel in slow motion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, that's what worried me, 'cause it turns out Nicky was about to be sent to Vegas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, we're clear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's more!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think that's it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's more! There's a couple stuck in there. I know there's more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God, I'm telling you, they're out!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, damn it. Don't get so defensive. It could be stuck in your hair, you know. NICKY grasps JENNIFER's hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, there aren't... (A diamond falls out of her beehive.) There aren't but...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, there aren't? (Showing her the diamond.) What's that? (Slaps her.) Huh? What's that. (FRANK chuckles.) There's no more. Thanks, hon. INT. BACK HOME AIRPORT/CUSTOMS - DAY ON NICKY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I couldn't wait to get my hands on Vegas. But the bosses didn't send me out there to have a good time. INT. SAN MARINO ITALIAN GROCERY/BACK ROOM, KANSAS CITY - NIGHT Mob bosses FORLANO, CAPELLI, GAGGI, BORELLI and PISCANO seated around the back room table eating and talking as in the opening vignette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They sent me out there to make sure that nobody fucked with Ace and... INT. ACE'S TANGIERS PENTHOUSE, LAS VEGAS - DAY ACE opens the door to NICKY and JENNIFER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...nobody interfered with the fuckin' skim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Opening door) Hey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, how you doin'? (Kisses ACE.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey. Hey, Sammy, how are you? JENNIFER and NICKY take in ACE's spectacular Vegas-style penthouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Whispering) Wow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boy, look at this place, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Incredible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome to Vegas. CAMERA TILTS UP TO REVEAL A SWEEPING VIEW OF THE LAS VEGAS SKYLINE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, Sammy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somethin', huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Calling her over) Ginger. GINGER emerges from the bedroom. NICKY and JENNIFER are both stunned by her beauty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To ACE) Holy shit, what've you been doin' out here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Honey, come here. She walks to them
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is Jennifer and Nick. They're dear friends of mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Shaking hands) Good to meet you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Jennifer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pleasure. (Grasping GINGER's hand and kissing it.) Very nice to meet you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, how are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, Sammy. INT. ACE'S CAR, LAS VEGAS STRIP - NIGHT ACE and NICKY are driving through town, the neon lights of Vegas reflected in the windshield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After we ate, we left Jennifer and Ginger alone and we took a ride to talk. And then... he hit me with it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you think about me movin' out here? (ACE looks away.) What's the matter? You got a problem with that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, of course not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Playfully) You mean, I have your permission?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, you have my permission. But I - I just gotta tell you it's no joke out here. It's no joke, you know? You gotta keep a low profile. It's not like back home. Right off the bat, they don't like guys like us. And this sheriff's a real cowboy. Even the coppers aren't afraid to bury people out in the desert here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't care. I want to get away from back home for a while. I'm tired of that shit back there. (Referring to the Vegas lights.) Look at this place. It's made of money. You know what the best part is? Nobody's gonna know what we're doin'! There's nobody here to see us! Everybody's back home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nick, I gotta tell you, I got pinched twice for no reason. You really gotta be careful. I'm running a licensed place. Everything's legit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry about it. I'm not gonna do anything. What am I gonna do? I'm especially not gonna involve you in anything. ACE gives NICKY a look. EXT./INT. LAS VEGAS SPORTSBOOK - NIGHT NICKY and MARINO pull up in their car and get out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ace saw Vegas one way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You call this guy and tell him I'm comin'?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. They walk into the sportsbook, past numerous bar patrons and gamblers to TONY, the bookie at a betting counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I saw it another. I saw it as untouched. I mean, they had bookies, pimps and drug dealers I could shake down. Who the fuck were they gonna run to?  So, I started getting everybody in line. Best of all, for the first time in my life, I figured out a way not to lose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, he had a fool-proof scheme, all right. It wasn't very scientific but it worked. When he won, he collected. When he lost, he told the bookies to go fuck themselves. What were they gonna do? Muscle Nicky? (Chuckles.) Nicky was the muscle. NICKY grabs TONY by the back of his neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How you doin'?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How you doin'?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, yeah. You got that thing for me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What thing? Oh, Nicky... I thought you was layin'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was layin'? No, no, I'm taking it. I was takin' it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sure?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm positive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'm a little confused here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a little confused?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Pointing to a window, above a counter with a tiny opening to talk through) Maybe if I stick your fuckin' face through this window over here like, you know, you'll - you'll get unconfused. Give me the fuckin' money! TONY takes some money out of his coat pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Groaning) I'm sorry, Nicky. I didn't mean anything by it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I know, that's why you had it ready. You thought I was fuckin' layin' it?! He smacks the bookie on the head with the wad of money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Gasps) My fuckin' head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your fuckin' head, huh? Don't fuck around, Tony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Pointing to TONY) Smarten up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Walking out) You jag-off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (From following scene) And now... INT. CATHOLIC SCHOOL CLASSROOM - DAY NICKY and JENNIFER stand in the background with other parents listening to a NUN school teacher. LITTLE NICKY and other youngsters are seated at small children's desks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Nicholas Santoro will come up and tell us about our first president.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Stepping up in front of the class to begin a speech) George Washington was born in a...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But still, it was nice and quiet for a while. Ginger and I presented Nicky and Jennifer all over town, like regular Ozzie and Harriets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...typical Virginia farmhouse. EXT. LITTLE LEAGUE FIELD - DAY NICKY and DETECTIVE BOB JOHNSON are coaching their sons. JOHNSON pats LITTLE NICKY on the back and with encouraging words sends him running on to the field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To LITTLE NICKY) Beautiful. You got a beautiful swing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ace got my son, little Nicky, involved with Little League, and it was great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, I want you to get out there and get me singles and doubles, okay? 'Cause that's what's gonna win this game.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Putting on a gold bracelet) Come on. Can I keep this one in the house?

direction.raw_text: Now look, (gently holding her face, gathering her total attention) pay attention to me. What I'm gonna tell you is very important.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All this stuff doesn't mean anything. Money, this, doesn't mean anything without trust. I have to be able to trust you with my life. EXT. BURBANK PRIVATE AIRPORT - DAY TITLE IN: 'LOS ANGELES' ACE and GINGER get off the Tangiers jet carrying two suitcases. ACE gives a chauffeur the luggage and follows GINGER into a brown Rolls Royce.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With over a million in cash and jewels tucked in a bank in Vegas only for Ginger, she was secure and happy. INT. BEVERLEY HILLS BANK - DAY ACE and GINGER walk into the bank lobby carrying the suitcases.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She loved that shit. But a guy in my line of work has to have a lot of pay-off cash around. INT. BEVERLEY HILLS BANK/VAULT - DAY There are several safe deposit boxes filled with cash. ACE and GINGER are closing a large box so crammed with cash that ACE has to lean on it for the clasp to lock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crooked cops and kidnappers, they don't take checks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Need a little help with that, Mr Collins?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And, since I'd either be in jail or locked in a closet when I needed the money the most... The BANK PRESIDENT joins them, and he and ACE simultaneously double-lock the outer safe box door with two separate keys, after which, ACE gives GINGER his key.

direction.raw_text: ...I gave Ginger the only key to the cash that could get me back alive. INT. BANK PRESIDENT'S OFFICE - DAY GINGER is on the other side of a glass wall, signing papers.

direction.raw_text: So, once she signs those papers, she'll be the only person to have total access to the box?  No one else, including myself?

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Quietly.) Sam, let me ask you a question. You must really trust your wife.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, tha-that's good. It's just unusual. To tell you the truth, so many of my clients don't.

direction.raw_text: Well... ACE looks over to GINGER, smiles and winks. She looks back at him. INT. TANGIERS LOUNGE - NIGHT JERRY VALE sings to a seated audience. ACE sits alone at a table.

direction.raw_text: With Ginger and the money in place, I felt covered, and to play it safe I switched job titles again and made myself, um, Food and Beverage Director. This way nobody would bother me about a license. I mean, Vegas was like a dream for me. Trouble was... NICKY is seated at another table with MARINO, peeling off money and giving it to MIKE, a crooked dealer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Nicky was dreamin' his own kind of Vegas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To begin, I put money out on the streets, chargin' three points a week. You know - juice to the fuckin' dealers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To MIKE) Don't make us come lookin' for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, you won't have to look for me. I appreciate it. Thanks, Nicky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, Mike. MIKE gets up from the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They were degenerate gamblers, coke freaks. In no time, I had half the dealers in the Tangiers in my pocket. Then... INT. TANGIERS POKER TABLE - NIGHT NICKY is at a table with his gang of card sharks: SLIM, ROCKY, MOOSH and COWBOY, all secretly signaling each other, sandbagging a mark. MIKE, the crooked dealer from the previous scene, deals NICKY a winning hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...the next thing I did, I started bustin' out high-stakes poker players.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was so obvious. I mean, all of Nicky's half-assed mechanics, they were real signal happy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scratching his arm) I'm gonna open for five hundred.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Signaling back and forth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I bet thirty-five hundred. NICKY wiggles a toothpick back and forth in his mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've been losing for three days straight, non-stop. Another shark pulls on his ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, why're you crying, with three loaves of bread under your arm? ACE watches their signals with concern.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nicky thought nobody was watching him. But he was wrong. We see two undercover gaming agents, looking like tourists, sneaking looks at NICKY's table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I didn't want any of those agents near my place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Four aces, Doc. His hands spread five cards on the table, showing four aces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you got?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Getting up in disgust) Jesus Christ. I can't believe it. COWBOY, the card shark with the cowboy hat, rakes in a large pot toward his side of the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I didn't have bad luck, I wouldn't have any luck. I'm out of here, you understand?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, I wished to God Nicky and his whole crew would just get lost. He walks towards NICKY's table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What am I gonna do? Go back home and start a war? ACE leans down to talk to NICKY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, Nicky's a made guy and I'm not. I can't do that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Whispering in NICKY's ear) Be careful. Gaming agents are all over the place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, I'm lucky. I'm not allowed to get lucky in this place?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You been lucky all week. They're lookin' to nail ya. ACE walks away. NICKY looks over at the gaming agents.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ace was so fuckin' worried about his casino, he forgot what we were doin' out here in the first place. INT. TANGIERS CASINO - NIGHT Security people are pulling apart a husband and wife who are fighting. Camera picks up ACE as he passes by them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A million times I wanted to yell in his fuckin' ear: 'This is Las Vegas! We're supposed to be out here robbin', you dumb fuckin' Heeb.' INT. TANGIERS CASINO POKER TABLE - NIGHT Closeup of the COWBOY's white-socked feet with no shoes on a poker table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To SHERBERT, referring to COWBOY) I don't give a shit who he's connected to. Tell him to take his fuckin' feet off the table. What's he think this is, a goddamn sawdust joint? SHERBERT approaches COWBOY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, would you mind taking your feet off the table and putting your shoes on, please?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Sighs) Yeah, I would mind. I'm havin' a bad night. COWBOY remains the same with his feet on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Returning to ACE) Fuckin' asshole won't budge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Call security. ACE approaches COWBOY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. How are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. You want to do me a favor? You want to take your feet off the table and put your shoes back on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you. ACE walks to nearby SECURITY GUARDS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To GUARDS) I want you to exit this guy off the premises, and I want you to exit him off his feet and use his head to open the fuckin' door. Three SECURITY GUARDS approach COWBOY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, you're gonna have to leave. You mind accompanying us outside?

direction.raw_text: Bullshit, I ain't goin' anywhere with you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bullshit, you're out of here, cowboy! SECURITY GUARD #1 knocks his feet off the table, as GUARDS #2 and #3 lift him off his seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you! Fuck you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know who you're fuckin' with?! Huh? Do you?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now move along.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Screaming at ACE who follows him) You fuckin' faggot! Do you know who you're fuckin' with? The GUARDS carry him out and forcefully shove him towards a side exit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave me alone!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here we go!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Grunting) You've gotta be kidding me! (Groans.) The GUARDS lift him off his feet and, holding him like a battering ram, smash his head into the door.

direction.raw_text: (As COWBOY is thrown out the door) Sure enough, an hour later, I get the call. INT. VEGAS BAR - NIGHT NICKY is on a public wall-phone talking to ACE. MARINO is staring at the disheveled COWBOY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Ace, what happened over there? I mean, did you know that guy you threw out was with me? INT. TANGIERS CASINO - NIGHT ACE is on a Tangiers house phone. SHERBERT looks on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) No, I didn't know that. But you know what he did?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) No. INT. VEGAS BAR - NIGHT NICKY gives COWBOY a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) He insulted Billy. And then I walked over to him politely... INT. TANGIERS CASINO - NIGHT ACE (Into telephone) ...and he tells me to go fuck myself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Then he called me a faggot. INT. VEGAS BAR - NIGHT ACE (Over telephone) So what do you think I do? I threw that cocksucker out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) What? Ho- (He puts down the phone; to COWBOY:) Hey, come here. COWBOY walks up to him.

direction.raw_text: You called my friend a faggot? You tell him to go fuck himself?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nicky, I did -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that what you did?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did - I didn't -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell him to go fuck himself? You fuckin' hick!  Fuckin'... NICKY hits him on the head with the phone. COWBOY falls back, groaning. INT. TANGIERS CASINO - NIGHT ACE listens to the noise of NICKY roughing up COWBOY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) ...you big fuckin' hick, you. Come here. Come here. Get him up. Come here. ACE LOOKS AT SHERBERT.

VEGAS BAR - NIGHT NICKY (To COWBOY) ...you won't be able to get that cowboy hat on. You hear me? Fuckin' hick. (Into telephone) Sammy, listen... INT. TANGIERS CASINO - NIGHT NICKY (Over telephone) ...this guy obviously doesn't know who he was talkin' to, you understand? He doesn't... INT. VEGAS BAR - NIGHT NICKY (Into telephone) ...know that, uh, we're dear friends. I mean, he's already very sorry. But, uh, if you could do me a favor to let him back in, I swear to you he'll never get out of line again. I promise you that. INT. TANGIERS CASINO - NIGHT ACE (Into telephone) If he does it again, he's out for good. I don't care what it is, Nick, I'm gonna ha- I'll - I'll never let him in the place again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) I'm sorry about this. Really. INT. VEGAS BAR - NIGHT NICKY (Into telephone) All right, Ace?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Thanks, pal. NICKY hangs up the phone and turns to COWBOY.

direction.raw_text: You took your boots off? You put your feet on the table... you shit- kicking, stinky, horse-manure-smellin' motherfucker you!  You fuck me up over there, I'll stick you in a hole in the fuckin' desert! You understand? (Slapping him.) Go over there and apologize. (Kicking the chastened COWBOY away.) Go! Get the fuck out of -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nicky, I'm sorry. EXT. TANGIERS CASINO - DAY A tiger leaps towards the camera, which pans over to two showgirls and then to ACE's hand holding the key to a Rolls Royce. He gives it to JONATHAN and DAVID as reporters rush in to photograph the moment.

direction.raw_text: You know, Ace could be a very touchy guy, especially when he got bigger and bigger in town. BACKSTAGE TANGIERS THEATER - DAY ACE and SHERBERT watch as a STAGE MANAGER weighs in the 'Femme Fatale' Showgirls.

direction.raw_text: But I'll tell you, he knew how to bring in the crowds. He knew all the fuckin' angles. He brought over the whole 'Femme Fatale' show from Paris. direction.raw_text: It's always been our policy -

direction.raw_text: No. Just stop everything. SHERBERT and ACE walk away across a huge stage.

direction.raw_text: (To ACE) This woman's an institution.

TANGIERS CASINO SPORTSBOOK - NIGHT ACE standing in a large space surrounded by giant TV screens showing sports events. Around him, long rows of bettors are seated at betting stations, lined up at windows, or wandering around at the bar. It's like a NASA control room on launch day.

direction.raw_text: Hey, I gotta give the guy credit. He does the most obvious thing. This is the only town in the country where a bookie joint is legit, so, why not take advantage, right?  So... he took bookie joints off the street and then opened them up inside the casino. Well, within a few years, by doin' all of this, he had every casino on the Strip trying to copy off him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Between... EXT. BACK ALLEY - NIGHT NICKY, with MARINO, punching and kicking a man next to the open door of his luxury car.

direction.raw_text: ...my innovations... The man falls to the ground.

direction.raw_text: ...and Nicky's dedication to his job... NICKY starts kicking him.

direction.raw_text: ...I soon had the best operation on the Strip. NICKY lifts an empty trash can and shatters the car's windshield. INT. TANGIERS CASINO FLOOR - NIGHT ACE and NICKY are standing on the casino floor near the slot- machines. Gamblers are milling about behind them.

direction.raw_text: I'm - I'm hearin' things from security. They're all ex-cops. The Sheriff's lookin' to bust your balls. They want to put you in the Black Book.

direction.raw_text: That Black Book is a bunch of bullshit. They got two names in there for the whole country and one of them is still Al Capone.

direction.raw_text: Bullshit or no bullshit, they put you in that book, you're gonna be in a lot of trouble. You will not be able to walk into the casino. I'm tellin' you.

direction.raw_text: What am I doin' out here? I'm tryin' to make a livin', that's all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm just tellin' you. Don't say I didn't warn you.

direction.raw_text: All right. INT. VEGAS VALLEY COUNTRY CLUB, 1974 - NIGHT Tight on the filaments of a flash bulb as they ignite. TV news crews and still photographers are taking pictures of ACE and GINGER surrounded by clusters of celebrities and the Vegas power elite, including SHERBERT and GREEN, at a black tie event.

direction.raw_text: Mrs Rothstein, look straight ahead. Very nice. Thank you.

direction.raw_text: Thank you.

direction.raw_text: Yes, nice smile.

direction.raw_text: Just look right at the camera. Hold that pose. We hear GREEN making a speech over flashing cameras and freeze frames of himself, SHERBERT, ACE and GINGER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Considering all of his hard work and dedication and the new lifeblood he has instilled in Las Vegas... We now see GREEN at a mike speaking in front of the seated club members.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sam has established himself as an indispensable member of the gaming community. As the head of the Tangiers Gaming Corporation, it's my pleasure to welcome Sam Rothstein to the Vegas Valley Country Club. Members cheer and applaud as GREEN hands ACE a framed citation. It reads: 'This Certificate of Appreciation. Sam Rothstein. Charitable Foundations of Greater Las Vegas'. They shake hands for the photographers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back home, they would have put me in jail for what I'm doing. But out here, they're givin' me awards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into the microphone) It's with great pleasure that I accept this certificate of appreciation from the... CAMERA TILTS UP TO A MOUNTED PLAQUE ON THE WALL, READING: 'CHARITABLE FOUNDATIONS OF GREATER LAS VEGAS'. INT. VEGAS VALLEY COUNTRY-CLUB BANQUET ROOM - NIGHT A dazzling GINGER moves charmingly about the room chatting up top executives, lawyers, judges, bankers and their wives. ACE, standing with GREEN and an elderly man, watches her work the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Congratulations, sweetheart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sam raised more than we've ever raised before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He worked so hard.

direction.raw_text: But my greatest pleasure was watchin' my wife, Ginger, work the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you for everything.

direction.raw_text: They all loved her. How could you not live her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To COUNTRY-CLUB WOMAN #3) Hi. Nice to see you.

direction.raw_text: She could be the most charming woman you ever saw. People loved to be around her.

direction.raw_text: Thanks.

direction.raw_text: Thanks. Yes, all right.

direction.raw_text: Great.

direction.raw_text: She made everybody feel good. GINGER joins ACE. He smiles proudly. INT. VEGAS VALLEY COUNTRY-CLUB BANQUET ROOM - NIGHT GINGER and ACE are off alone by a dining-room table, talking intently. A young casino EXECUTIVE interrupts them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Congratulations, Sam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Shaking his hand) Oh, thanks. The flirting EXECUTIVE looks at GINGER.

direction.raw_text: Hi.

direction.raw_text: You're one of the most gorgeous women I've ever seen. You're a lucky man Mr Rothstein. ACE watches as GINGER flashes one of her dazzling smiles, but he's not sure whether she's flirting. He looks at the young man and back at his wife.

direction.raw_text: Thank you. Thanks for that compliment.

VEGAS BANK VIEWING ROOM - DAY GINGER, with two-year-old AMY in a stroller, is seated on a bench going through large bank vault boxes containing her jewels.

direction.raw_text: (To AMY) Hey, do you want to see this one? Daddy gave me all this jewelry because he loves me so much. (She places a gold bracelet on AMY's hand.) Put your arm in there.

direction.raw_text: (To AMY, wearing the bracelet) Oh, fabulous.

direction.raw_text: Look at this. Look at this. CAMERA PULLS AWAY FROM THE DOOR LEADING TO THE VIEWING ROOM REVEALING A BANK MANAGER SEATED AT A DESK. WE HEAR GINGER AND AMY BEHIND THE DOOR.

direction.raw_text: And with Ginger happy, I was able to concentrate on what I knew best. INT. TANGIERS CASINO, SLOT-MACHINES - NIGHT ACE is talking to DON WARD.

direction.raw_text: Well, it wasn't long before what I was afraid was gonna happen, happened. Nicky managed to get himself banned from every casino in Las Vegas, and from then on, I couldn't be seen talkin' to him anywhere in Vegas, or even near it.
