direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Blood streaming out of his mouth) Charlie M.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Screaming) Charlie M? You make me pop your fuckin' eye out of your head to protect that piece of shit? Charlie M? You dumb motherfucker!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Pleading) Kill me, you fuck, kill me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kill you, (unwinds the crank) You motherfucker you! (To MARINO.) Frankie, do him a fuckin' favor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The word got around that finally... MARINO places a knife against DOGS's neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...there was a real gangster in town. Nicky was the new boss of Las Vegas. We hear DOGS gasp as the knife slices his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Charlie M! INT. TANGIERS CASINO - DAY Extreme close-up of a slot-machine. Four reels with sevens across. Suddenly, the power goes out. Lights die down.. Machine 'waaaooows' down to a dead stop. Security guards, on their hands and knees, are pulling the plugs on the three giant $15,000 progressive machines, as ACE talks to DON WARD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Four reels, sevens across, three fifteen-thousand-dollar jackpots? Do you have any idea what the odds are?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shoot, it's gotta be in the millions, maybe more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three fuckin' jackpots in twenty minutes? Why didn't you pull the machines? Why didn't you call me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it happened so quick. Three guys won. I didn't have a chance to call you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You didn't see the scam? You didn't see what was goin' on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, there's no way to determine that, Sam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, there is. An infallible way! They won!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it's a casino. People gotta win sometimes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey... Ward, you're pissin' me off. Now, you're insulting my intelligence. What do you think, I'm a fuckin' idiot? You know goddamn well somebody had to get into those machines and set those fuckin' reels. SHERBERT enters, stands next to ACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The probability on one-four-reel machine is a million and a half to one. On three machines in a row, it's in the billions.  It cannot happen... would not happen, you fuckin' momo! What's the matter with you!  Didn't you see you were bein' set up on the second win?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I really think you're -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Interrupts) You - Wait! You didn't see that you were being set up on the second win?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I really think you're overreacting in this whole -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Interrupts) Listen, you fuckin' yokel, I've had it with you. I've been carryin' your ass in this place ever since I got here. Get your ass and get your things and get out of here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're firin' me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm firin' you? No, I'm not firin' (mocking WARD) I'm firin' you, you - Gives SHERBERT a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You might regret this, Mr Rothstein.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll regret it even more if I keep you on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is not the way to treat people.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, if you didn't know you're bein' scammed, you're too fuckin' dumb to keep this job. If you did know, you were in on it. Either way, you're out!  Get out! Go on. (To SHERBERT.) Let's go. ACE and SHERBERT walk off, WARD turns to leave. INT. TANGIERS CASINO, AKU-AKU LOUNGE - DAY, AN HOUR LATER ACE and GREEN are seated having coffee and muffins in the Hawaiian lounge by the casino floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, the guy is history as far as I'm concerned. History.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you can't just fire him. Webb's his brother-in-law. He's County Commissioner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what? Everybody out here with cowboy boots is a fuckin' county commissioner or related to a county commissioner. I'm fuckin' sick of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is his state. His uncle's Chief Judge. His brother-in-law runs the County Commission. I don't know how many other relatives he's got in town.  There's gotta be a way to work him back in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Phil, I can understand. You're in the finances, you're upstairs, but you are not on the floor. I got thousands of players. I got five hundred dealers.  They're all lookin' to rob me blind, twenty-four hours a day. I have to let them know I'm watching all the details, all the time; that there is not one single thing I will not catch as I am over here. Breaks open his blueberry muffin, puts it down and points to Green's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at yours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at that. Look at this. There's nothin'... look how many blueberries your muffin has and how many mine has. Yours is falling apart. I have nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's like everything else in this place. You don't do it yourself, it never gets done. GREEN follows ACE to the kitchen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where you goin'? INT. TANGIERS KITCHEN - DAY ACE, GREEN and the BAKER are gathered around the BAKER's counter surrounded by muffin tins and batter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Handing the BAKER the two muffins) From now on I want you to put an equal amount of blueberries in each muffin. An equal amount of blueberries in each muffin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know how long that's going to take?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't care how long it takes. Put an equal amount in each muffin. ACE leaves, GREEN looks on in amazement as the BAKER holds the muffins. GREEN follows ACE out. INT. ACE'S HOUSE, KITCHEN - DAY ACE, seated at the kitchen table, is feeding AMY in a high chair. The nanny is in the background.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, honey, just a little. That a girl, that a girl. Oh, boy, look. GINGER enters and goes to the sink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To AMY, who is sobbing and mumbling) Okay, want to go with Mommy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you need?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Giving AMY to the NANNY) You get her?  Okay. (To ACE.) Well, I need a lot. I need more than usual.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, why don't you take it out of your account? There's a lot there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I would, you know, Sam. It's just that... well, I need more than that. I need twenty-five thousand. She sits down at the table next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Twenty-five thousand? For yourself?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Picking up an empty carton of milk) Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you need that much?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, what's the difference? I just need it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I mean... you know, I gotta ask you. That's a lot of money. You're not asking for a box of popcorn, you know. I mean...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm aware of that. We don't have to turn this into a big deal. (Getting up to the refrigerator.) Okay? We don't have to have a fight. It was important to me. But forget it. Just something I wanted to do for myself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's fighting? I mean, I'm, you know, tell me what it's for. GINGER, annoyed, closes the refrigerator door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why can't you tell me what it's for? She stirs her coffee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh? (Pause) Well, you know what? Now, I want you to tell me. I mean, my wife comes to me and asks me for twenty-five thousand. I mean, what do you want? Do you want a coat?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, if you want a coat, you got it. You know that. It's not the money, it's just why do you want it?  That's all I'm askin'. Am I not entitled to that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look - Sam, I've been independent my whole life. I never had to ask anybody for anything. Now you're making me beg you for this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talkin' a- ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Interrupting) Okay? And you're embarrassing me. Why do want to make me feel so bad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're askin' me for twenty-five thousand. I'm not out to make you feel bad. I want to just be able to trust you. You now, it's about trust. I have to be able to trust you with my life. Do you understand? Can I trust you? (She doesn't answer.) Can I trust you?... Can I trust you?... Answer me. Can I trust you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Quietly) You can trust me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good, so then you could tell me what the money is for. GINGER gives him a look and leaves. INT. VEGAS BANK VAULT - DAY GINGER takes about two inches of $100 bills out of a safe deposit box and slips it in an envelope. EXT. VEGAS/BANK/PUBLIC PHONE - DAY NICKY is on a phone watching GINGER leave the bank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Yeah, she's leavin' the bank now. All right, I'm gonna follow her. (He hangs up.) INT. SALVADORAN DINER BOOTH - DAY GINGER is in a booth with LESTER DIAMOND, handing him the envelope filled with money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does that mean? No, I know that look. What does that mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It means I got the money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got money. That's a - That's a good look. SWISH PAN TO ACE ENTERING, FOLLOWED BY A HOOD. HE SITS DOWN AT THE BOOTH WITH LESTER AND GINGER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How you doin', Les? It's Lester, right? Sam. Extends his hand to LESTER, who shakes it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From my recollection, aren't you the card shark... the golf hustler... the pimp from Beverly Hills? LESTER gives GINGER a 'how did you fuck this up?' Look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I'm wrong, please correct me, 'cause I never knew you to be a heist man. (LESTER sighs.) But if you are, you know what... here, take mine too. ACE takes some money out of his coat and puts the thick wad of bills on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go ahead, take it. 'Cause you already have hers. LESTER turns and sees two HOODS standing by the front and back doors of the diner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's my wife. (To LESTER.) Look at me. You did know that, didn't you? You knew that she's my wife? Huh? Hey, look at me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, yeah. I know that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You do? Yeah? Well, if you ever come back again... ever... to take her money... next time bring a pistol. That way you got a chance. Be a man, don't be a fuckin' pimp. Now, you want to do me a favor? Get out of here. I want to be alone with my wife. Get the fuck up and get out of here. After stammering for a moment, LESTER gets up and begins to move towards the back door. LESTER (Quietly) Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You fuckin' piece of shit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, that's just fuckin' - That's bullshit. You know, you know, what the fuck? The thugs follow him out of the back door. GINGER freezes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You remember when you called him that night? When you said goodbye to him?  He didn't say, 'Don't get married, I'll be right down, we'll get married.'  He didn't say that to you, did he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Whispering) No, he didn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Picks up the money) Didn't. No, instead, what did he say? 'Fuck him. Take him for everything he's got.' ACE takes GINGER by the arm to the rear of the diner where they can see the parking area through a glass door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come here, I want to show you somethin'. EXT. REAR OF SALVADORAN DINER, PARKING LOT - DAY Three HOODS rush LESTER who is running towards his car. GINGER bursts through the doors, trying to get to LESTER. ACE holds her back. They struggle. LESTER groans and gasps as the HOODS start to beat him up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You fuckin' shit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! No! No! Don't! ACE restrains her. The HOODS punch LESTER in the face and stomach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Make them stop it! (Sobbing.) No! No! No! It's not his fault! It's my fault! NICKY watches from a car in a parking lot across the street, out of GINGER's sight. ACE forces GINGER into the car as the HOODS finish the beating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Sobbing) No! No! The HOODS toss LESTER into his car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Falling into the front seat on his back.) Fuck! NICKY watches as the HOODS walk away from LESTER's car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You piece of shit. ACE pulls out of the parking lot with a wailing GINGER. LESTER groans, trying to sit up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (As ACE and GINGER drive off down the street) Couldn't do it yourself, you chickenshit cocksucker! INT. GOLD RUSH BACK ROOM - DAY GINGER and NICKY are in the back room. NICKY is sitting on a couch while GINGER stands by a mirror with a curling iron.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Throwing the iron on the counter) He's such a prick. He had some guy from the hotel beat him up. He didn't want to do it himself. Oh, no, he didn't want to get his own hands dirty. She takes a pill with a drink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, why'd he have to do that, huh? She walks towards NICKY, who is sitting on a couch across the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know it wasn't a nice thing to do but -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Interrupts) Yeah, no shit. She sits down next to NICKY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you gotta understand it. He doesn't know if this guy is shaking you down or taking advantage of you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! No! I told him all about the guy before we ever got married. This is no fuckin' surprise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, you did? I didn't know that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. He's just a friend of mine I was trying to help, so... so what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know... the first time I ever saw your guys together... I never saw him so happy. I mean, I know he's a crazy Jew fuck and everything, but... She smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I never see - You know, I never seen him act like that with anybody else. I think he's crazy about you. I mean, he really loves you. He does.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, come on. I went into this with my eyes open, you know. I knew the bottom could drop out at any time. I'm a working girl, right?  You don't think I'm gonna go into a situation like this if I don't think I'm gonna get covered on the back end.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Am I right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can see that. Sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, he put aside some jewelry for me. A lot of jewelry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean, like a lot of expensive jewelry? About how much?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm, you want to steal it? (Cracking a smile.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I - I'm just curious, you know. I was wonderin' how much he would put into a thing like that. That's all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm told it's worth about a million dollars, maybe more. (Sniffs.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, there you go. But what does that tell ya? A million dollars in jewelry. Does that tell you the guy is crazy about you, or what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I should have never married him. He's a Gemini. A triple Gemini... duality. (Breaking down.) Gemini's the snake. You know you can't trust the snake. (Sniffs.) I mean it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know what you mean. He moves closer to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, Ginger... you know, this is probably not... I don't have the answers anyway... and this is probably not what you want to hear right now, because you're a little upset with Ace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I understand that. But, you know, I think you should try to make the best of it now. Go slow, you know. See what happens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He could have killed him! Okay? He could have killed him. She gets up and walks to the counter by the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He didn't have to hit him. It's not exactly like I'm sleepin' with the guy! And he makes me sneak around to see my own friends! What the fuck is that all about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I guess it's 'cause he loves you so much. He's jealous and worried.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Sighs, her voice starts to crack) He gives a fuck what I do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Getting up) Look, I'll try to find out what the hell's goin' on. When I see him I'll talk to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. (Walking over to him, smiling.) Thanks. Towering over NICKY, holding a drink in one hand and his shoulder in the other, she leans down and kisses him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks for puttin' up with me. NICKY takes the drink out of her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And take it easy with this shit, will you? I mean, this can only make matters worse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, come on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a beautiful girl. You don't want to ruin your looks. I've seen a lot of girls get shot to hell from this stuff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Fidgeting with his jacket, then holding his face in her hands, smiling.) You're so nice. (She begins to cry.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, now, I don't want to see you unhappy. She kisses him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Tenderly strokes his head) Thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. She embraces NICKY, wrapping her arms around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Through tears) Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Feeling a little awkward with the hug) It's all right. She kisses him again. NICKY doesn't move, holding back. INT. ACE'S OFFICE - DAY Pull back from a sign, with a tiny 'yes' on top of a gigantic 'no', leaning on a window overlooking the sportsbook. We see ACE, behind his desk, taking a swig of Mylanta. His SECRETARY telephones. INT. ACE'S OUTER OFFICE, SECRETARY'S DESK - DAY We see past PAT WEBB's cowboy hat down onto Ace's SECRETARY on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Mr Rothstein? County Commissioner Pat Webb is here to see you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) Okay... INT. ACE'S OFFICE - DAY ACE (Into telephone) ...give me a minute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) Okay. ACE hangs up the phone. INT. ACE'S OUTER OFFICE, SECRETARY'S DESK - DAY SECRETARY (To WEBB) It'll just be a minute. INT. ACE'S OFFICE - DAY ACE gets up from his desk and we see he is in his boxer shorts. He opens the closet and carefully puts on the trousers hanging inside. INT. ACE'S OUTER OFFICE - DAY A very patient WEBB is leaning against some double doors across from Ace's SECRETARY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr Webb...  Can I get you anything?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no. (Cordially tipping his hat.) No, thank you, little lady. INT. ACE'S OFFICE - DAY ACE (Into telephone) Okay, send him in and call me four minutes after. WEBB walks in. He is big, tough and western, wearing a Stetson, tooled boots, jeans, an elbow-patched jacket and a turquoise bear claw string-tie. His headband contains a rattlesnake head. Ace's SECRETARY shuts the door on her way out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr Rothstein... (With hand outstretched to ACE.) I'm Pat Webb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you do? They shake hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, it is my pleasure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I heard a lot about you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, thank you, sir. Looking out Ace's office picture window overlooking the sportsbook.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, house is doin' well. (Chuckling.) Hey, all that money is rollin' in. I appreciate you takin' the time to see a poor ol' civil servant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, that's quite all right. TILT UP FROM WEBB'S SNAKESKIN COWBOY BOOTS AND ACE'S BLUE SHOES AS THEY CONTINUE TALKING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you have a seat?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hm? Oh. Thank you, sir. WEBB sits down in a chair in front of ACE's desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, I come here personally to kind of smooth over a fracas about a certain matter. See, uh, maybe you didn't know it, but, uh, Don Ward is a very well-liked man in this town. He's got lots of friends here. Now, his family and their money go back many, many years. Now, friends vote... family and money votes. That's important to me... and you. And if you'll think about our little problem along them lines...  and you forgive me for sayin' it, maybe he did not deserve to be fired.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, but he knew about our gettin' hit on three big machines in a row and he did nothing about it. That means either he was in on it or, forgive me for saying this, he was too dumb to see what was going on. Either way, I cannot have a man like that workin' here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Before we point the dirty end of the stick at 'ol Don, uh, we better be sure we can prove them charges.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Believe me, if I could prove it, he would be under arrest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are, uh - (Clears throat.) - are we certain that you want the Gamin' Control Board eyeballin' your record and your gangster pals like Nicky Santoro?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you're way out of line talkin' to me like that. What you're sayin' is libelous, and you're in no position to challenge my expertise. I went way out of my way to be very helpful and courteous to that kid. He's weak, he's incompetent. He jeopardizes the whole place. There's not much more I can do for him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Chuckling) You have got me there. Old Don is as useless as tits on a boar. (Chuckles.) But, he is my brother-in-law, and I would look on it as a personal favor if you'd think some more on hirin' him back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't do that. And I appreciate the fact that he's your brother-in- law, and I do want to help you and I like to do favors, and I know who you are, but I cannot do that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, could there be any position... further down the trough?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Pause) I'm sorry, I can't do anything. He's too incompetent. And the bottom line is, he cannot be trusted. The telephone rings. ACE picks it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Okay, thanks. (To WEBB.) Um... you know, that's it. I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr Rothstein. Your people never will understand the way it works out here. You're all just our guests. But you act like you're at home. Let me tell you somethin', partner... you ain't home. But that's where we're gonna send you if it harelips the Governor. (Pause.) Thank you for your time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No problem. (Getting up and shaking hands.) Sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Smiles slightly) You bet. INT. ACE'S HOUSE, BATHROOM/BEDROOM - DAY ACE, in pain from his ulcer, opens a bottle of pills in his bathroom and sees that it is almost empty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to my pills? He leaves the bathroom and walks into the bedroom where GINGER is stretched out on their imperial bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Waving the pill bottle) Isn't it bad enough you're drinkin' too much, you're takin' all my pills too?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't take your pills.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look - for my ulcer, I take a half a one of these, a half a one of these. And that's when I have extreme pain. I had a three-month supply. What'd you do with 'em?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Sobbing) You didn't have to beat him up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Walking back to the bathroom) What? ACE puts the bottle into the medicine cabinet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Sobbing) I was just tryin' to help him. It's not like I'm sleeping with the guy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, how do I know?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Sobbing) You can't make me stop caring...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? What?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said, you can't make me stop caring about people. She starts to cry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Trying to calm her) Listen. (Stepping up to the bed.) Ginger. I'm tryin' to make the best of everything here, you know?  I mean, you're my wife, for chrissakes. Uh, I mean... people look up to you in this town. I don't know what to think -

direction.raw_text: ...and the Sam Rothstein Dancers. THE CAMERA PANS TO A GROUP OF DANCERS ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE STAGE. We see ACE greeting various guests in the audience as he moves towards the stage.

direction.raw_text: ...Entertainment Director of the Tangiers Hotel Casino: Mr Sam Rothstein. ACE approaches his desk as TRUDY sits on a long sofa. The audience applauds. The band plays and the dancers complete their number.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Seated at a desk a la Johnny Carson) Welcome to the Sam Rothstein Show. We're very happy to have you here this evening. The young lady to my left is Trudy, who is a lead new dancer in our fabulous show from Paris. Audience applauds, she waves hello.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our first guest this evening... is Frankie Avalon. FRANKIE AVALON walks to the stage, embracing TRUDY and shaking ACE's hand. Audience applauds. WEBB stands in the rear of the sportsbook/theater with AUSTIN and DUPREY, watching ACE.

direction.raw_text: Keep an eye on him. He exits.

direction.raw_text: ...Well, I've got a large family.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into microphone) Uh, I'm very proud to say that we have eight children.

direction.raw_text: (Into microphone) Eight children! (He encourages the audience to applaud.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into microphone) No, no, no, no, please, please, please, please, no, please.

direction.raw_text: (Into microphone, to audience) That's amazing.

direction.raw_text: (Into microphone) There was nothing to it. (Chuckles) It was my pleasure. INT. TANGIERS, GREEN'S OFFICE - NIGHT GREEN and ARTHUR CAPP are solemnly watching another episode of Ace's TV show with an elderly juggler guest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ace, don't do it. ACE begins to juggle.

direction.raw_text: Oh, no, no. No, no. Oh, Jesus... he's juggling! The audience cheers him on.

direction.raw_text: (From next scene) Let's not take County Commissioner Pat Webb too seriously. INT. TANGIERS SPORTSBOOK/ACES HIGH - NIGHT WE MOVE PAST TWO TELEVISION CAMERAS TO ACE BEHIND HIS DESK AT ANOTHER TAPING OF HIS SHOW. TRUDY IS AT HIS SIDE.

direction.raw_text: (Into microphone) I recently challenged him to a debate on this program and he declined. What are you worried about, Pat? You don't have to send me any questions. You can ask me anything you want.

ALL-AMERICAN GAS STATION, GAGGI'S BACK OFFICE, BACK HOME - DAY Vegas Sun newspaper front page photo of ACE on television. Headline reads: 'Rothstein Sues Gaming Commission'. STONE is sitting across from GAGGI at his office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's on all night, screamin' about how he's gonna take his damn lawsuit all the way to the Supreme Court. He really must be crazy. He's gonna go to Washington with this? (Chuckles.) He's out of his fuckin' mind.

direction.raw_text: (From next scene) It's a pity in this... INT. TANGIERS SPORTSBOOK/ACES HIGH - NIGHT ACE (Into microphone) ...state that we have such hypocrisy. Some people can do whatever they want. Other people have to pay through the nose. INT. ALL-AMERICAN GAS STATION, GAGGI'S BACK OFFICE, BACK HOME - DAY ACE (O.S.) (From previous scene) But such is life. GAGGI Andy, go see him. Tell him maybe it's time he should quit. EXT. MIGHTY MART CONVENIENCE STORE, REAR PARKING LOT, LAS VEGAS - NIGHT SHERBERT and ACE pull up beside another parked car. ACE gets out of his car in a robe and pajamas and gets into STONE's car. INT. STONE'S CAR - NIGHT ACE First of all, what they did was totally unconstitutional. We're already on the list to be heard before the Supreme Court of the United States later this year.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These guys back home don't give a fuck about the Supreme Court and any of this bullshit! They want things to quiet down. They want you to walk away from -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Walk away? Andy, you can't be serious. How can I walk away? Don't you see what's goin' on here? Don't you see what's at stake?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The old man said, 'Maybe your friend should give in.'  And when the old man says 'maybe', that's like a papal bull. Not only should you quit, you should run!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Know what my problem is? Every time they mention my name in the papers, these cocksuckers, they mention Nicky, too. How the fuck does that help?  I mean, the heat he brought down is murder!  We had a police department who was cooperative. He's pissed them off so much now that nobody can make a move anymore. I mean, what do you do about that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you propose?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, he doesn't listen to me. Maybe he should...  get lost for a while. Take a vacation. Would that be so bad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They ain't sendin' Nicky nowhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, look, if he took a break, it would just give everybody some time to maneuver. That's all I'm saying. It's all that I'm saying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I would forget about the maneuver. I would just get out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Sighs) I can't do that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course... INT. NICKY'S HOUSE, KITCHEN - DAY JENNIFER is on the phone with GINGER; NICKY listens in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) You know, I don't feel like playin' tennis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...as soon as Andy got back home, Nicky heard about our talk in the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Let's go to lunch. Do you want to go to the Riviera?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Next morning bright and early, I get the call.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) One o'clock? INT. ACE'S HOUSE, LIVING-ROOM - DAY ACE listens in on GINGER's and JENNIFER's conversation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) Great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) You know, I've got to do some shopping afterwards. Do you want to go? INT. NICKY'S HOUSE, KITCHEN - DAY JENNIFER (Into telephone) Well, you know...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But just getting a call from Nicky wasn't easy anymore. Even the codes didn't work. So, we figured out another act. INT. FBI PHONE TAP ROOM - DAY A bored FBI man, seated at his desk with a tape recorder and headphones, looks at his wrist watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You see, if a phone's tapped, the Feds can only listen in... INT. ACE'S HOUSE, LIVING ROOM - DAY ACE (V.O.) ...on the stuff involving crimes. So on... INT. NICKY'S HOUSE, KITCHEN - DAY ACE (V.O.) ...routine calls, they have to click off after a few minutes. INT. FBI PHONE TAP ROOM - DAY GINGER (Over telephone) Yeah, and I get a sprained fuckin' elbow. The FBI man clicks off the tape recorder. INT. NICKY'S HOUSE, KITCHEN - DAY JENNIFER quickly hands the phone to her husband. INT. ACE'S HOUSE, LIVING-ROOM - DAY GINGER hands the phone to ACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Yeah. INT. NICKY'S HOUSE, KITCHEN - DAY NICKY (Into telephone) Meet me at three. INT. ACE'S HOUSE, LIVING ROOM - DAY ACE (Into telephone) What - what, Caesar's?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) No, a... INT. NICKY'S HOUSE, KITCHEN - DAY NICKY (Into telephone) ...hundred yards further down the road. INT. ACE'S HOUSE, LIVING-ROOM - DAY ACE (Into telephone) Why? INT. NICKY'S HOUSE, KITCHEN - DAY NICKY (Into telephone) Don't ask questions. Just be there. NICKY gives the phone back to JENNIFER. INT. ACE'S HOUSE, LIVING-ROOM - DAY ACE gives the phone to GINGER. INT. NICKY'S HOUSE, KITCHEN NICKY (To himself) Always asking questions. He exits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Suzy Creamcheese has the exact... INT. FBI PHONE TAP ROOM - DAY The bored FBI agent clicks on again and hears GINGER and JENNIFER's inane conversation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) ...same outfit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Chuckles, over telephone) But I saw something... INT. ACE'S HOUSE, LIVING-ROOM - DAY GINGER (Into telephone) ...something very... cute. ACE sits down on the couch behind her and lights a cigarette. INT. FBI STAKEOUT POST, MOTEL ACROSS THE FROM THE GOLD RUSH - DAY Through a windows of a motel room across the street from The Gold Rush, an FBI AGENT watches NICKY and MARINO exit the jewelry store, get into a parked car and rive away. IRIS OUT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into a radio) Okay, he, uh, he's out. It's the ant, uh, Brown unit. And he's with, uh, bogie. I think it's Frankie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nicky started out before me because it wasn't that easy... SWISH PAN TO THE FBI AGENT LOOKING OUT THE WINDOW TALKING INTO A RADIO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...for him to get around anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into radio) Okay, pulled out... SWISH PAN TO NICKY AND MARINO DRIVING DOWN THE STREET.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into radio) ...pretty fast. He's headed upstream.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nicky couldn't even go for a ride without changing... SWISH PAN TO FBI CAR TRAILING BEHIND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...cars at least six times before he could shake all his tails. INT. UNDERGROUND PARKING GARAGE #1 - DAY NICKY's car with MARINO driving pulls in; NICKY jumps out and gets in another car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And because of all the planes, he had to use underground garages. MARINO drives off. INT. UNDERGROUND PARKING GARAGE #2 - DAY NICKY's second car screeches in to another garage. INT. UNDERGROUND PARKING GARAGE #3 - DAY NICKY hurries across the lot to another car. INT. UNDERGROUND PARKING GARAGE #4 - DAY NICKY changes cars again. INT. UNDERGROUND PARKING GARAGE #5 - DAY NICKY is running to yet another car. He drives off. EXT. DESERT SCENE - DAY A solitary ACE waiting in the vast desert, looking around. ACE looks at a sage brush and sand and a few rocks on the desert floor. This could be a hole meant for him. He steps away from it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meeting in the middle of the desert always made me nervous. It's a scary place. I knew about the holes in the desert, of course, and everywhere I looked, there could have been a hole. EXT. DESERT ROAD - DAY Aerial shot of NICKY driving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Normally, my prospects of comin' back alive from a meeting with Nicky were ninety-nine out of a hundred. But this time, when I heard him say, 'A couple a hundred yards down the road', I gave myself fifty-fifty. EXT. DESERT - DAY ACE still standing in the desert. NICKY's car suddenly appears as a reflection in ACE's sunglasses, shaking ACE out of his desert-induced reverie. NICKY's car pulls up by ACE. He gets out and storms up to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where the fuck you get off talkin' to people about me behind my back? Goin' over my head?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What people?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What people! What'd you think, I wasn't gonna find out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't even know what you're talkin' about, Nick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No? You said I'm bringin' heat on you?! I gotta listen to people because of your fuckin' shit?! You're ordering me out?! You better get your own fuckin' army, pal!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't do anything. I mean, I didn't order you or anybody...  I only told Andy Stone that you had a lot of heat on you, and that was a problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want me to get out of my own fuckin' town?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I said I - let the bullshit blow over for a while so I can run the casino. Anything goes wrong with the casino, it's my ass. It's not yours, it's my ass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I don't know whether you know this or not, but you only have your fuckin' casino because I made that possible!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Interrupting) I'm what counts out here! Not your fuckin' country clubs or your fuckin' TV shows! And what the fuck are you doin' on TV anyhow?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Interrupting) You know I get calls from back home every fuckin' day?!  They think you went batshit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm only on TV because I gotta be able to hang around the casino. You understand that. You know that. Come on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your fuckin' ass! You could have had the food and beverage job without goin' on television!  You wanted to go on TV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I did want to go on TV. That way I have a forum. I can fight back. I'm known. People see me. They know they can't fuck around with me like they could if I was an unknown. That's right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're makin' a big fuckin' spectacle of yourself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me?! I wouldn't even be in this situation if it wasn't for you. You brought down so much fuckin' heat on me. I mean, every time I meet somebody here, the big question is do I know you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, sure. Now you want to blame your fuckin' license on me, is that it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it - it - Nicky, when you asked me if you could come out here, what did I tell you? I mean, you asked me, and I knew you were going to come out no matter what I said, but what did I tell you? Do you remember what I told...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Interrupting) Back -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...you? Do you remember what I told you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back - Back up, back up a fuckin' minute here. One minute. I asked you?! When the fuck did I ever ask you if I could come out here?! Get this through your head, you -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Interrupting) You never - ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get this through your head, you Jew motherfucker, you. You only exist out here because of me!  That's the only reason!  Without me, you, personally, every fuckin' wiseguy skell [Skell: the lowest form of wiseguy - a drunken bum] around'll take a piece of your fuckin' Jew ass! Then where you gonna go?!  You're fuckin' warned! Don't ever go over my fuckin' head again! You motherfucker, you! NICKY drives off, leaving an angry and frustrated ACE to ponder the desert and the holes. INT. JUBILATION NIGHTCLUB - NIGHT Overhead of ACE, OSCAR, SHERBERT, TRUDY and showgirls walking down the zebra pattern carpet of the nightclub. They are escorted to their table. NICKY, MARINO and DOMINICK are seated at another table in the rear of the club so no one can hear their conversation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, we got company. ACE avoids looking at NICKY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you see that? Dumb Jew motherfucker. Grew up together and he's actin' like he don't even know me. I know we're supposed to avoid each other, but, you know, there's ways to do things and there's ways not to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Fuck him. SHERBERT and the others make a toast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To Abraham Lincoln.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: L'chaim. [Yiddish for 'to life']
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here we go. Good luck. NICKY watches ACE's entourage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget about it, Nick. Don't let it bother you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why, does it look like it's bothering me? What do I give a fuck?  Fuckin' Oscar too. All the fuckin' money I've given that prick, he don't even look over here. What's his problem?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuckin' Jews stick together, don't they?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're havin' a good time too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So are we. NICKY, MARINO and DOMINICK are isolated and alone at their table. INT. ACE'S BEDROOM - NIGHT ACE sleeping. A hot line to the casino rings as a red light blinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Yeah? INT. TANGIERS CASINO SPORTSBOOK - NIGHT SHERBERT is calling ACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Quietly into telephone) Sam, we got a problem. INT. ACE'S BEDROOM - NIGHT ACE (Into telephone) What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) The little guy. He's half in the bag, and nobody told him he was eighty- sixed from the joint, so we... INT. TANGIERS CASINO SPORTSBOOK - NIGHT SHERBERT (Into telephone) ...all turned our heads and made out like we didn't know who he was. He's over at the twenty-one table with his... INT. TANGIERS BLACKJACK TABLE - NIGHT NICKY is betting every spot on the blackjack table. MARINO is standing behind him. The DEALER is nervous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...nose wide open. He took the money out of his own kick. His nose is open for about ten thousand. SHERBERT and the pit boss look on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, he's really pissed. INT. ACE'S BEDROOM - NIGHT ACE (Into telephone) Oh, no. Sits up and throws off the bed covers. INT. TANGIERS SPORTSBOOK - NIGHT SHERBERT (Into telephone) He wants a fifty-thousand marker. INT. ACE'S BEDROOM - NIGHT ACE (Into telephone) No, just - just give him, give him ten. That's it. Ten.  I'll be right down. INT. TANGIERS BLACKJACK TABLE - NIGHT SHERBERT (To NICKY) He's gonna come up with ten thousand, just the way you wanted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ten thou? No, no, no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...give you ten thousand -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Grabbing SHERBERT's lapel) Fifty! I said fifty!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, take -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Pushing him away and walking back to the blackjack table) Fuckin' fifty thousand!  Go get it. I don't give a fuck where you get it. (To FEMALE DEALER.) Fuckers!  They take it, but they don't want to give it back. NICKY turns up another bad card and looks at the dealer. She smiles as she slides the house winnings over to her side of the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How the fuck can you grin? How the fuck could you grin? The FEMALE DEALER looks to her PIT BOSS for help. He steps up to a MALE DEALER at a neighboring table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know how much I'm stuck? You give a fuck? The MALE DEALER walks up to the FEMALE DEALER and taps her on the shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do ya?! She lays down some cards, claps her hands to show the Eye-in- the-Sky that they are empty, and exits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To departing FEMALE DEALER) Yeah. Give yourself a hand right across your fuckin' mouth. The MALE DEALER takes her place behind the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at this fuckin' beaut they put in now. Sherbert send you in here to rob me now? Been fuckin' knockin' everybody's dick in all night? Huh? You been beatin' all the customers tonight, motherfucker? We see the PIT BOSS lock up the chip tray from the table the dealer has just left. NICKY has a diminished stack of chips and an upturned ten and a two.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh, jag-off? Hit me. The card is a king or a 'paint', a picture card, meaning that NICKY has lost. Everyone freezes in fear. NICKY takes the paint and flicks it at the DEALER's chest where it sticks to his shirt.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take this stiff and pound it up your fuckin' ass! Hit me again. The DEALER looks to the PIT BOSS who nods 'okay'. He turns over a card. It's another paint, a queen. NICKY flicks the card to the DEALER's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take this one and stick it up your sister's ass! Hit me again. The DEALER looks to the PIT BOSS again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it, keep lookin' at him, you fuckin' dummy. If you had any fuckin' heart at all, you'd be out fuckin' stealin' for a livin'. (Tossing the card at the DEALER.) Hit me again. The DEALER looks at the PIT BOSS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck you keep lookin' at him for, huh, you fuckin' pu- The DEALER deals him another paint.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at this, twenty fuckin' paints in a row. Hit me again! ACE enters the casino with SHERBERT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To NICKY) He's here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To the DEALER) You should pay as fast as you collect, you know. NICKY gets up to go over to ACE, glowering at SHERBERT as he walks past. ACE and NICKY are partially hidden behind a pillar by the slot-machines.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doin'? You gotta get out of here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Sammy, tell this Jew motherfucker over here to pay that marker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nicky, Nicky, you're not listenin' to me. I'm here to help you. What's the matter with you?  You're gonna bury us both.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just give me the money. Fuckin' give me the fuckin' money, Sammy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna okay you ten and get you even, and that's it. Then you got to get out of here before the cops and the newspapers are all over you. To the PIT BOSS, holding up ten fingers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ten and that's it. He makes a throat cutting gesture with his hand. ACE leaves. NICKY turns to walk back to the table. He sees SHERBERT standing right behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you starin' at, you bald- headed Jew prick?! Before SHERBERT can answer, NICKY grabs the receiver off a wall phone and hits him across the face and back. SHERBERT falls to the floor. NICKY pulls the cradle off the pillar and tosses it down on his back. He and MARINO walk back to the table, SHERBERT winces on the floor in shock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sue me, you Jew fuck!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get out of here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Get out of here? I got a marker comin'. He puts some chips down on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To DEALER) Deal. INT. OSCAR, THE LAWYER'S OFFICE - DAY ACE and GINGER are seated across from OSCAR, their lawyer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, but everything's changed now. You're talking about a divorce. You're even asking for alimony payments and... child support... and now custody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just want what any divorced woman would get.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean she's only sober about two hours a day. It's usually from eleven in the morning until one in the afternoon. And if I gave her her money and her jewels now, you know what she's gonna do? She's gonna piss it all away in about a year, and then where will she be? (To GINGER.) Where would you be then? Comin' right back to me, right back to me. (To OSCAR.) Or finding some other excuse to come and I - I -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To ACE) We had a deal. Remember that? (To OSCAR.) He said if it didn't work out between us, that I could get my things and I could leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To GINGER, leaning closer to her) Look in my eyes. Look in my eyes. GINGER turns to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know me. Do you see anything in these eyes that makes you think I would ever let someone in your condition take my child away from me? (Pause.) Do you?  You know that won't happen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And after all this time... and as hard as I tried, as much as I wanted... INT. ACES HIGH BACKSTAGE CORRIDOR/SHOWGIRLS' DRESSING-ROOM - DAY ACE, with Kleenex sticking out of his collar to protect his shirt from his television make-up, walks back to the dressing room with TRUDY. She pecks his cheek before exiting to her own room. A security guard opens the door for ACE. We follow him past numerous showgirls and costumes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I could never reach her. I could never make her love me. I always felt she should have gone for all that money... being somebody for the first time in her life, a home and a kid. But that's not what happened. It just didn't work out that way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To the showgirls) Everything all right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, what could we do? After a while, we'd just take breathers from each other. You know, little separations. At that time, I remember Ginger took Amy and went to Beverly Hills. She was gonna spend a week or so shopping. ACE picks up the phone at a make-up table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) Yes, Mr Rothstein.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Operator, the Beverly Hotel in Beverly Hills, please. EXT. LOS ANGELES. BEVERLY HOTEL - DAY GINGER, sporting a new short hairstyle, and AMY exit and walk towards camera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Beverly Hotel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mrs. Sam Rothstein, please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry.  Mr. and Mrs. Rothstein have checked out already. TRACK BACK, AS GINGER SMILES, TO REVEAL LESTER DIAMOND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey. GINGER kisses LESTER. INT. SHOWGIRLS' DRESSING-ROOM - DAY ACE (Into telephone)
direction.name: direction

(Gets up, picking up a pair of ACE's shoes and tossing them on the floor.) God, fuck! Shit! God! (She runs out, taking a fur coat off a hangar. Then, grunting) Really pisses me off... (To COP #2.) Don't worry about it. COP #2 follows her out of the closet. EXT. ACE'S HOUSE - MORNING ACE, COP #1 and several neighbors wait as GINGER storms out with COP #2 carrying a small overnight bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To the COPS but looking at ACE) And it would be great if you guys could follow me out of here, because he's been threatening me. GINGER walks to her car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To COP #1) Come on. I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to COP #1, shaking hands) Okay, Randy. Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, take care. GINGER backs her car out, smashing into ACE's car once again. EXT. ACE'S HOUSE, KITCHEN WINDOWS - MORNING SHERBERT watches from a small, curtained window. EXT. NEIGHBORHOOD STREET - MORNING GINGER drives down the street followed by the police car. The FBI camper pulls out and follows the squad car following GINGER. EXT. GINGER'S CAR - MORNING GINGER is driving and crying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To herself, panting) I can't believe this. (Sighs.) EXT. VEGAS BANK - MORNING GINGER swerves into the bank, parks in front of the main entrance and gets out of her car. The COPS park behind her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To COPS, rushing inside) I just need to pick up a little cash inside.  Could you come with me? EXT. FBI SURVEILLANCE CAR, ACROSS THE STREET - MORNING Two more FBI AGENTS, with binoculars and a camera, photograph GINGER as she walks into the bank. INT. VEGAS BANK VAULT - MORNING A bank employee is helping GINGER unlock a safe deposit box. She pulls it out hurriedly. INT. ACE'S HOUSE, UPSTAIRS DEN - MORNING ACE is on the phone talking to CHARLIE CLARK. He's looking at the jimmied rawer, broken scissors and the missing keys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone, throwing the scissors into the open drawer) Charlie, you've gotta - you've gotta stop her!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) I-I'm sorry, Sam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) You've got to stop her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) What can I do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) She's a fuckin' junkie. She's out of her fucking mind.  Do you unders- SHERBERT is behind ACE, listening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) She has... INT. VEGAS BANK - MORNING CHARLIE CLARK is on the phone. GINGER, in the background, comes out of the vault and carries one of her boxes to a cubicle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) ...the keys, and it's still in both your names.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Carrying the box, slipping but catching herself) Whoa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) I'm sorry, there's nothing I can do. I'd like to help... INT. ACE'S HOUSE, UPSTAIRS DEN - MORNING CHARLIE CLARK (Over telephone) ...but I can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Legally, she can't take that stuff. Legally, she can't take the stuff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) No, Ace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Half of everything is mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Over telephone) Ace, listen to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Into telephone) Half - I'm comin' down. (He hangs up.) EXT. ACE'S HOUSE, DRIVEWAY - MORNING ACE and SHERBERT get into ACE's damaged car. A metal strip dangling from SHERBERT's door scrapes the pavement as they pull out. INT. VEGAS BANK - DAY GINGER opens the safe deposit box, which is filled with bound stacks of cash. She grabs handfuls in a frenzy, some fall off the counter to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit! Oh, goddamn it! GINGER gets down on the floor to pick them up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Then, to COPS who are watching) Um, I'm gonna need a bag. If you could just ask the guy for a big bag, okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To COP #2) Go get a bag, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Looking up, offering COP #1 some cash) And here. Here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lady, I can't. I can't. I ca- COP #2 exits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you can, you can. (Sobbing.) You've been so nice to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Taking the money) I can't. INT. VEGAS BANK - MORNING, A LITTLE LATER COP #2 holds open a large canvas bag for GINGER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (To GINGER) Like this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Struggling with two handfuls of cash) Yeah, just hold the top open, all right, and I can - She starts to stuff the money in the bag. EXT. FBI SURVEILLANCE CAR, ACROSS THE STREET - MORNING The FBI AGENTS photograph GINGER leaving the bank. EXT. VEGAS BANK - DAY GINGER throws the canvas bag into the trunk of her car when, suddenly, she sees ACE's beat-up Cadillac approaching. She gasps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, God. It's him. (To COPS.) You have to stop him. You have to - 'Cause he said he was going to kill me. ACE jumps out of his car and runs toward GINGER, SHERBERT follows him out. ACE is intercepted by the COPS who hold him back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You just - Just stop him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr Ro- Mr Roth- Mr Rothstein, where you goin' -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, hold on a second.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on a second. The COPS huddle around ACE and SHERBERT until GINGER's car pulls out of the bank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothin' we can do about it. Nothin' we can do. There's nothin' we can do. ACE, unable to pursue, watches GINGER speed away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, look. You can't stop her for speeding? I mean, look what the hell she's doing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Speeding?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're talkin' to you right now. GINGER's car disappears into traffic. The FBI car across the street follows right behind her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's nothing we can do. She had the key.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's on the account. There's nothing we can do. EXT. FBI SURVEILLANCE CAR - MORNING The AGENTS are following GINGER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's pull her over at that Citgo Station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Driving) Okay, let's do it. FBI AGENT #1 puts a siren on top of the car's roof. EXT. VEGAS STREET, CITGO STATION - MORNING GINGER pulls over at a gas station, the FBI car with siren blaring right behind her. EXT. VEGAS BANK - MORNING A powerless ACE and SHERBERT are still standing in front of the bank with the COPS. COP #2 gives ACE a 'sorry' gesture. EXT. CITGO STATION - MORNING GINGER and the FBI AGENTS are standing by her car. She is distraught.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're - we're placing you under arrest for -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Sobbing) For what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're placing you under arrest for aiding and abetting -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Through tears) What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're placing you under arrest for aiding and abetting a -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Crying) But I'm just trying to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After all the threats and all the bullshit, it turned out Ginger didn't tell 'em anything. But by then, the Feds didn't need her, anyway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Sobbing) But it was just mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They had all the pieces they needed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I didn't do anything. The AGENTS escort GINGER to their car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And everybody... EXT. GOLD RUSH - NIGHT Twelve FBI AGENTS with rifles, wearing 'FBI' armbands, charge into the parking lot and rush through the front door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...began to tumble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Between Nicky, Ginger, me and my license... paradise... we managed to really fuck it all up. INT. NICKY'S HOUSE - NIGHT We hear a doorbell ring. LITTLE NICKY, now ten years old, see FBI AGENTS approaching the house.
